forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air is cool and crisp, enveloping the city with a clarity that whispers of possibilities beneath the star-speckled sky. A gentle westward breeze brings a serene calm, while the temperature dips to a comforting chill around 49 degrees. The promise of dawn brings with it the expectation of sunshine illuminating the city's iconic skyline, granting us a brief respite from the fog that often cloaks these hills.

When Friday arrives, it greets us with mostly sunny skies and a high hovering near the inviting mark of 59 degrees. The warmth will hold for a short while, gradually succumbing to a slight drop in the afternoon—an ode to San Francisco’s capricious nature, no doubt. With a light southwest wind whispering through the streets, one can imagine a day spent strolling along the waterfront—perhaps indulging in a leisurely brunch at a corner café or exploring the hidden charms of the Mission District’s murals. Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket or sweater will provide comfort against the remnants of morning chill, while a touch of sun protection could enhance your outing as the day unfolds. 

Seize this opportunity to wander, to breathe deeply of the fresh air, and to engage with the pulse of a city that vibrates with creativity and spirit, even in the quiet of a February morning.
